law.catch_line: An employer may not ask or require an employee to waive any right under this subtitle or 29 C.F.R. 1...

text.section: An employer may not ask or require an employee to waive any right under this subtitle or 29 C.F.R. 1910.1200.
A waiver of a right under this subtitle or 29 C.F.R. 1910.1200 is void.
